Name: Grizelda:  Lynx and the Nine Lives
About the game: Join Lynx on an adventure to rescue a princess and collect 9 souls. A retro-action RPG filled with puzzles, dungeons, and treasure. What happens when a sleeping kitty cat follows a mouse into his hole? Plunged into a magical land where dogs have taken over, Lynx must win back the mythical artifacts that will lead him to Princess Grizelda. Granny Tortoise sets you on a journey to defeat the soul guardians and rescue Whinnie and Ricky Mouse, Rascal the Racoon, Herb the Sheep, and more. Inspired by classic pixel RPG games like Zelda, Kings Quest, Final Fantasy, and more, rediscover the nostalgia of 1980 & 90s adventure games. Help kitties in real life, and consider donating to your local animal shelter or ASPCA.
